tool_description: Get League Of Legends game data
name: LeagueOfLegends
title: LeagueOfLegends

api_list.name: getChampions
api_list.description: Retrieve all champions

api_list.name: getAllChampionMasteries
api_list.description: Get all champion mastery entries sorted by number of champion points descending

required_parameters.name: summonerId
required_parameters.description: Summoner ID associated with the player

api_list.name: getAllLeaguePositionsForSummoner
api_list.description: Get league positions in all queues for a given summoner ID.

api_list.name: getAllLeaguesForSummoner
api_list.description: Get leagues in all queues for a given summoner ID

api_list.name: getByAccountId
api_list.description: Get a summoner by account ID.

api_list.name: getBySummonerId
api_list.description: Get a summoner by summoner id.

api_list.name: getBySummonerName
api_list.description: Get a summoner by summoner name.

api_list.name: getChallengerLeague
api_list.description: Get the challenger league for a given queue.

required_parameters.name: type
required_parameters.description: Game queue type. Values: RANKED_FLEX_SR, RANKED_FLEX_TT, RANKED_SOLO_5x5

api_list.name: getChampionById
api_list.description: Retrieve champion by ID

api_list.name: getChampionDataById
api_list.description: Retrieves champion by ID

optional_parameters.name: version
optional_parameters.description: Data dragon version for returned data. If not specified, the latest version for the region is used. List of valid versions can be obtained from the /versions endpoint

optional_parameters.name: locale
optional_parameters.description: Locale code for returned data (e.g., en_US, es_ES). If not specified, the default locale for the region is used.

optional_parameters.name: champData
optional_parameters.description: Tags to return additional data. Only id, key, name, and title are returned by default if this parameter isn't specified. To return all additional data, use the tag 'all'.

api_list.name: getChampionList
api_list.description: Retrieves champion list

optional_parameters.name: version
optional_parameters.description: Data dragon version for returned data. If not specified, the latest version for the region is used. List of valid versions can be obtained from the /versions endpoint

optional_parameters.name: locale
optional_parameters.description: Locale code for returned data (e.g., en_US, es_ES). If not specified, the default locale for the region is used.

optional_parameters.name: dataById
optional_parameters.description: If specified as true, the returned data map will use the champions' IDs as the keys. If not specified or specified as false, the returned data map will use the champions' keys instead.

optional_parameters.name: champListData
optional_parameters.description: Tags to return additional data. Only type, version, data, id, key, name, and title are returned by default if this parameter isn't specified. To return all additional data, use the tag 'all'.

api_list.name: getChampionMasteryScore
api_list.description: Get a player's total champion mastery score, which is the sum of individual champion mastery levels.

required_parameters.name: summonerId
required_parameters.description: Summoner ID associated with the player

api_list.name: getCurrentGameInfoBySummoner
api_list.description: Get current game information for the given summoner ID.

api_list.name: getFeaturedGames
api_list.description: Get list of featured games

api_list.name: getItemById
api_list.description: Retrieves item by ID

optional_parameters.name: version
optional_parameters.description: Data dragon version for returned data. If not specified, the latest version for the region is used. List of valid versions can be obtained from the /versions endpoint

optional_parameters.name: locale
optional_parameters.description: Locale code for returned data (e.g., en_US, es_ES). If not specified, the default locale for the region is used.

optional_parameters.name: itemData
optional_parameters.description: Tags to return additional data. Only id, name, plaintext, group, and description are returned by default if this parameter isn't specified. To return all additional data, use the tag 'all'.

api_list.name: getItemList
api_list.description: Retrieves item list

optional_parameters.name: version
optional_parameters.description: Data dragon version for returned data. If not specified, the latest version for the region is used. List of valid versions can be obtained from the /versions endpoint

optional_parameters.name: locale
optional_parameters.description: Locale code for returned data (e.g., en_US, es_ES). If not specified, the default locale for the region is used.

optional_parameters.name: itemListData
optional_parameters.description: Tags to return additional data. Only type, version, basic, data, id, name, plaintext, group, and description are returned by default if this parameter isn't specified. To return all additional data, use the tag 'all'.

api_list.name: getLanguageStrings
api_list.description: Retrieve language strings data

optional_parameters.name: version
optional_parameters.description: Data dragon version for returned data. If not specified, the latest version for the region is used. List of valid versions can be obtained from the /versions endpoint

optional_parameters.name: locale
optional_parameters.description: Locale code for returned data (e.g., en_US, es_ES). If not specified, the default locale for the region is used.

api_list.name: getLanguages
api_list.description: Retrieve supported languages data.

api_list.name: getLobbyEventsByCode
api_list.description: Gets a list of lobby events by tournament code.

api_list.name: getMapData
api_list.description: Retrieve map data.

optional_parameters.name: version
optional_parameters.description: Data dragon version for returned data. If not specified, the latest version for the region is used. List of valid versions can be obtained from the /versions endpoint

optional_parameters.name: locale
optional_parameters.description: Locale code for returned data (e.g., en_US, es_ES). If not specified, the default locale for the region is used.

api_list.name: getMasterLeague
api_list.description: Get the master league for a given queue.

required_parameters.name: type
required_parameters.description: Game queue type. Values: RANKED_FLEX_SR, RANKED_FLEX_TT, RANKED_SOLO_5x5

api_list.name: getMasteryById
api_list.description: Retrieves mastery item by ID.

optional_parameters.name: version
optional_parameters.description: Data dragon version for returned data. If not specified, the latest version for the region is used. List of valid versions can be obtained from the /versions endpoint

optional_parameters.name: locale
optional_parameters.description: Locale code for returned data (e.g., en_US, es_ES). If not specified, the default locale for the region is used.

optional_parameters.name: masteryData
optional_parameters.description: Tags to return additional data. Only type, version, data, id, name, and description are returned by default if this parameter isn't specified. To return all additional data, use the tag 'all'.

api_list.name: getMasteryList
api_list.description: Retrieves mastery list

optional_parameters.name: locale
optional_parameters.description: Locale code for returned data (e.g., en_US, es_ES). If not specified, the default locale for the region is used.

optional_parameters.name: version
optional_parameters.description: Data dragon version for returned data. If not specified, the latest version for the region is used. List of valid versions can be obtained from the /versions endpoint

optional_parameters.name: masteryListData
optional_parameters.description: Tags to return additional data. Only type, version, data, id, name, and description are returned by default if this parameter isn't specified. To return all additional data, use the tag 'all'.

api_list.name: getMasteryPagesBySummonerId
api_list.description: Get mastery pages for a given summoner ID.

api_list.name: getMatch
api_list.description: Get match by match ID.

api_list.name: getMatchByTournamentCode
api_list.description: Get match by match ID and tournament code

api_list.name: getMatchIdsByTournamentCode
api_list.description: Get match IDs by tournament code

api_list.name: getMatchTimeline
api_list.description: Get match timeline by match ID

api_list.name: getMatchlist
api_list.description: Get matchlist for ranked games played on given account ID and platform ID

optional_parameters.name: beginTime
optional_parameters.description: The begin time to use for filtering matchlist

optional_parameters.name: season
optional_parameters.description: Set of season IDs for which to filtering matchlist.

optional_parameters.name: beginIndex
optional_parameters.description: The begin index to use for filtering matchlist.

optional_parameters.name: endIndex
optional_parameters.description: The end index to use for filtering matchlist.

optional_parameters.name: champion
optional_parameters.description: Set of champion IDs for which to filtering matchlist.

optional_parameters.name: endTime
optional_parameters.description: The end time to use for filtering matchlist

optional_parameters.name: queue
optional_parameters.description: Set of queue IDs for which to filtering matchlist.

api_list.name: getMockLobbyEventsByCode
api_list.description: Gets a mock list of lobby events by tournament code

api_list.name: getProfileIcons
api_list.description: Retrieve profile icons

optional_parameters.name: locale
optional_parameters.description: Locale code for returned data (e.g., en_US, es_ES). If not specified, the default locale for the region is used.

optional_parameters.name: version
optional_parameters.description: Data dragon version for returned data. If not specified, the latest version for the region is used. List of valid versions can be obtained from the /versions endpoint

api_list.name: getRealm
api_list.description: Retrieve realm data

api_list.name: getRecentMatchlist
api_list.description: Get matchlist for last 20 matches played on given account ID and platform ID

api_list.name: getRuneById
api_list.description: Retrieves rune by ID.

optional_parameters.name: version
optional_parameters.description: Data dragon version for returned data. If not specified, the latest version for the region is used. List of valid versions can be obtained from the /versions endpoint

optional_parameters.name: locale
optional_parameters.description: Locale code for returned data (e.g., en_US, es_ES). If not specified, the default locale for the region is used.

optional_parameters.name: runeData
optional_parameters.description: Tags to return additional data. Only type, version, data, id, name, rune, and description are returned by default if this parameter isn't specified. To return all additional data, use the tag 'all'.

api_list.name: getRuneList
api_list.description: Retrieves runes list

optional_parameters.name: locale
optional_parameters.description: Locale code for returned data (e.g., en_US, es_ES). If not specified, the default locale for the region is used.

optional_parameters.name: version
optional_parameters.description: Data dragon version for returned data. If not specified, the latest version for the region is used. List of valid versions can be obtained from the /versions endpoint

optional_parameters.name: runeListData
optional_parameters.description: Tags to return additional data. Only type, version, data, id, name, rune, and description are returned by default if this parameter isn't specified. To return all additional data, use the tag 'all'.

api_list.name: getRunePagesBySummonerId
api_list.description: Get rune pages for a given summoner ID

api_list.name: getShardData
api_list.description: Get League of Legends status for the given shard.

api_list.name: getSingleChampionMastery
api_list.description: Get a champion mastery by player ID and champion ID

required_parameters.name: championId
required_parameters.description: Champion ID to retrieve Champion Mastery for

required_parameters.name: summonerId
required_parameters.description: Summoner ID associated with the player

api_list.name: getSummonerSpellById
api_list.description: Retrieves summoner spell by id

optional_parameters.name: locale
optional_parameters.description: Locale code for returned data (e.g., en_US, es_ES). If not specified, the default locale for the region is used.

optional_parameters.name: version
optional_parameters.description: Data dragon version for returned data. If not specified, the latest version for the region is used. List of valid versions can be obtained from the /versions endpoint

optional_parameters.name: spellData
optional_parameters.description: Tags to return additional data. Only type, version, data, id, key, name, description, and summonerLevel are returned by default if this parameter isn't specified. To return all additional data, use the tag 'all'.

api_list.name: getSummonerSpellList
api_list.description: Retrieves summoner spell list

optional_parameters.name: version
optional_parameters.description: Data dragon version for returned data. If not specified, the latest version for the region is used. List of valid versions can be obtained from the /versions endpoint

optional_parameters.name: locale
optional_parameters.description: Locale code for returned data (e.g., en_US, es_ES). If not specified, the default locale for the region is used.

optional_parameters.name: dataById
optional_parameters.description: If specified as true, the returned data map will use the spells' IDs as the keys. If not specified or specified as false, the returned data map will use the spells' keys instead.

optional_parameters.name: spellListData
optional_parameters.description: Tags to return additional data. Only type, version, data, id, key, name, description, and summonerLevel are returned by default if this parameter isn't specified. To return all additional data, use the tag 'all'.

api_list.name: getTournamentCode
api_list.description: Returns the tournament code DTO associated with a tournament code string

api_list.name: getVersions
api_list.description: Retrieve version data
